|vendor_id = 11ab |device_id = 2a02 |subvendor_id = 07d1 |subdevice_id = 3b02 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = KA2DIR615A1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Marvell;88W8361P;88W8361P-BEM1, FN29481.1, 0616 A3P, TW; |chip2 = Marvell;88W8060;88W6060-NNR1, K484281.2, 0614 A3P, TW; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/14/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module is used in the [[D-Link DIR-615 rev A1]]. :The PCI ID for this entry is from a card pulled from the router.. but it is entirely possible that the card has been used elsewhere with a different subsystem.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Cameo WLN-1307 board top shield on.jpg|board top, shield on File:Cameo WLN-1307 board top shield off.jpg|board top, shield off File:Cameo WLN-1307 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
